thread.title: Paul Scholes: What I really think about Manchester United under Jose Mourinho
thread.title_full: Paul Scholes: What I really think about Manchester United under Jose Mourinho

title: Paul Scholes: What I really think about Manchester United under Jose Mourinho
text:
David De Gea, Ander Herrera and Juan Mata were snapped on a lunch date today! GETTY Paul Scholes believes Manchester United are on the right track under Jose Mourinho GETTY Manchester United is a happy place to be under Jose Mourinho 
And Scholes reckons his old club can achieve great things with Mourinho at the helm - backing them to finish third at   
"It's been a massive improvement from what we've seen in the last couple of years," he told the Daily Mail . 
"The first two or three months weren't great but they've turned it around. 
"There's a way of playing that the fans are enjoying. 
"The only problem is they're still sixth, which after being in such good form is a bit of a worry. But I watch them now and have no doubt they'll finish in the top four. GETTY Paul Scholes would have loved to play under Jose Mourinho for Manchester United 
"They're playing the best out of the top six with Chelsea and you have to fancy them to finish second or third. Probably third if I had to nail it down." 
Scholes was openly critical of former United bosses David Moyes and Louis van Gaal. 
But the former England international has admitted he would be happy to play in Mourinho's team. 
"Yes, definitely," he added. 
"There is a speed and desire to score goals which win games." Related articles
